p.d: Three-year-old Tom can't talk, can't sleep and cries a lot. His increasingly isolated and desperate parents have tried everything. The doctors prefer blaming the parents rather than actually finding the cause. When autism is finally diagnosed, the family can at last look to the future. Directed by: Renaud Bertrand (France, 2015) Cast: Julie-Marie Parmentier (Séverine), Bernard Campan (Christophe), Marie-Anne Chazel (Liliane), Côme Rossignol de La Ronde (Tom), Charlie Dupont (Michel), Patrick Descamps (Paul) Genre: drama
